name: Ecosia - Dark theme 2022
description: This theme is now its own browser extension! Extension links below - these are more actively maintained than this theme. Chrome & FireFox Ecosia Dark Theme - working in 2022 A dark theme for the Ecosia experience. Uses lightweight CSS to ensure a seamless dark experience. Compatibility: • Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera • Tested on 'Stylish' and 'Stylus' extensions Report any issues to the browser extension support pages! Development Team: See contributions on GitHub!

additional_info: Search 'Ecosia Dark Mode' in Chrome or Firefox extension store to find the dark mode extension! Thanks to user 'Freaky Lord' for developing these updates with me! Latest version (Updated 05/02/2021): v5.0 - First update in over a year. Bringing in line with the browser extension versions Update history: v4.3 - Fix a bunch of styling issues which have been tested on the browser extensions v4.2 - Update to keep in line with browser extension versions v4.1 - Update for the new images page style v4.01 - Fix buttons loading in white + fix blog author name + fix homepage + fix adblock card v4.0 - Major Release - Fixes all existing issues found from extensive testing & a complete re-write of the code-base for better future-proofing, compatibility & speed v3.7 - Styling to financial reports & other information page fixes + small search engine fixes v3.6 - Add fancy style to sign-in page + add styling to main results callouts v3.53 - Fix settings page styling + burger menu (finally!) + fix main results dropdown v3.52 - Fix settings page header + fix inconsistent scrollbar colour v3.51 - Settings page minor fixes + banner dark style + footer border colour fix + more v3.5 - Fix styling issues from recent updates + re-format settings page v3.41 - Fix coronavirus widget when 'Coronavirus' is searched v3.4 - Fix chrome styling issues + search bar shadows v3.33 - Fix new Chromium MS Edge Beta search bar styling issue v3.32 - Change search bar color + update fixes v3.31 - Dark theme logo for Ecosia blog! v3.3 - Fix latest Ecosia update changes + theme look & feel improvements v3.2 - Update buttons, popups, search bar and more to look subtly nicer! v3.11 - Fix small styling errors with search engine theme v3.1 - Added dark theme for blog - credit to 'Freaky Lord'! v3.02 - Fix share buttons footer + filters button + nav styling v3.01 - Fix initial Ecosia pop-ups + info page styling + minor fixes & styling changes v3.0 - Dark theme for information site added + minor changes v2.23 - Settings page + notifications updates v2.22 - Homepage fixes & more future proofing v2.21 - Fix tree counter + menu updates v2.2 - 10th Anniversary update & homepage improvements v2.1 - Future proofing & option to enable advertisements v2.0 - Mobile mode, logo update, pagination, forms, ad-block & more v1.0 - Initial release
